snippet: A silver Dodge Durango collided with a Toyota convertible, causing the Toyota to crash into the day care center with 50 children in a suburb of Orlando. The driver of the Durango fled.
abstract: Hit-and-run crash sends car barreling through a crowded day care center in Winter Park, Fla, killing one girl and injuring 15 people; Florida police find damaged car fitting description from witnesses, and identify suspect as convicted felon Robert Corchado.

byline.contributor: Wendy Thompson contributed reporting from Winter Park, Fla.

lead_paragraph: A silver Dodge Durango collided with a Toyota convertible, causing the Toyota to crash into the day care center with 50 children in a suburb of Orlando. The driver of the Durango fled.

headline.main: Hit and Run at Day Care in Florida Kills a Child
headline.print_headline: Hit and Run at Day Care in Florida Kills a Child
